name: hmyuuu-skills
description: Human Values Skills Repository - You Validate, AI Executes. Agentic skills for academic research, LaTeX/Typst workflows, and development automation.

plugins.name: issue-triage
plugins.description: Evaluate, polish, and create GitHub issues with human validation checkpoints. L2 autonomy - human sets method, reviews results.

plugins.name: academic-research
plugins.description: Research papers, write typst with cetz plots. L1-L2 autonomy with human validation at key decision points.

plugins.name: arxiv-digest
plugins.description: Autonomous daily digest of relevant arxiv papers in physics and ML based on your interests. L3 autonomy - human approves goal, reviews final digest.

plugins.name: latex-to-typst
plugins.description: Convert LaTeX documents to typst format. L3 autonomous conversion with human review of final output.

plugins.name: flowchart
plugins.description: Generate flowcharts with typst/cetz. L2 autonomy - directed creation with human validation.

plugins.name: derivation-checker
plugins.description: Step-by-step math derivation verification. L1 conversational - check every step with human.

plugins.name: experiment-logger
plugins.description: Log ML experiments with params and plots. L2 directed autonomy with human review of results.

plugins.name: citation-manager
plugins.description: Find and format citations automatically. L3 autonomous with human validation of final bibliography.
